Description_lang: Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within $A1 yards by $s1 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by ${100*(1/(1+($m2/100))-1)}% for $d.Affected allies are healed for $473901s1, split evenly among them.
AuraDescription_lang: Heal over time spells are healing ${100*(1/(1+($m2/100))-1)}% faster.
